text: New Journal of Physics is an online-only, open-access, peer-reviewed scientific journal covering research in all aspects of physics, as well as interdisciplinary topics where physics forms the central theme. The journal was established in 1998 and is a joint publication of the Institute of Physics and the Deutsche Physikalische Gesellschaft. It is published by IOP Publishing. The editor-in-chief is Barry C. Sanders (University of Calgary and University of Science and Technology of China). New Journal of Physics is part of the SCOAP3 initiative. == Abstracting and indexing == The journal is indexed and abstracted in: ==References== ==External links== * Category:Open access journals Category:Physics journals Category:IOP Publishing academic journals Category:Publications established in 1998 Category:English-language journals Category:Online-only journals
